name: Thomas was a phone
description:
Help Thomas the phone cause havok to his owners life.

Controllers:

  • Click the mouse, drag, and release to fling your phone to areas of signal.
  • Left and Right Arrows to adjust camera

Aim:

Get to full signal (watch your signal bars for when you get close to areas of full signal). Points are scored for txt messages sent (in areas of full signal).

#GMTKJAM 2021 entry Theme: Joined Together... We went a little left field here starting off with the idea of a phone being joined or linked to it's signal and battery. We expanded it out to be a silly I AM BREAD type game that also pokes fun at Thomas was alone (we love both of these games  😀).

Hope you enjoy flinging around, finding the phone signal to have the mad phone reply with trolling messages.

Game by: @BenByford and @TimBhison
